description: This table stores audit of linking and unlinking of donor episodes from the recipient episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DONOR_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The donor episode that was linked to or unlinked from the recipient episode.

columns.name: BMT_DONOR_LINK_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies whether the donor episode was linked to or unlinked from the recipient episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Add


Remove

columns.name: ACTION_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that performed the action.

columns.name: ACTION_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the change associated with the action.
